Cooking
■Put the apple pies into the
basket.

Cooking
■Don't splash the
oil! Put the
basket into the
oil and press
the timer.

Cooking
■When the timer rings, pull
up the basket and cut the
oil.

Cooking
■Set the holding time with
the timer.

Cooking
■Move the pies from the basket
to the tray.

Cooking
■Package them and put them in
the pie merchandiser.
